                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           - Customer satisfaction score
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           **Continuous Improvement:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           - Weekly return analysis
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           - Monthly performance review
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           - Quarterly strategy adjustment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           - Learn from successful sellers
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           ---
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           ## Common Issues and Solutions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           ### Issue: High Volume of "Not As Described" Returns
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           **Root Causes:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           - Photos don't accurately represent product
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           - Missing key specifications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           - Misleading descriptions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           - Wrong expectations set
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           **Solutions:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           1. **Improve Photos:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              - Multiple angles (6-8 photos minimum)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Close-ups of details
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    - Scale reference (next to common object)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       - Show product in use
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          - Accurate color representation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             - Natural lighting
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             2. **Enhance Descriptions:**

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Request expired
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   **Key Information:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Closure reason
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Resolution method
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Closure date
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Final status
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   **Seller Actions:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Review resolution methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Understand successful resolutions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Apply learnings to future cases
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Track closure patterns
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   #### 7. Rejected
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Refund-only requests that were rejected by either the seller or Daraz platform.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   **Key Information:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Rejection reason
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Who rejected (seller/Daraz)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Rejection date
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Evidence reviewed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Customer notification status
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   **Seller Actions:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Review rejection reasons for consistency
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Ensure rejections align with policies
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Document reasoning clearly
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Monitor if rejections lead to disputes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   - Learn from Daraz-rejected cases
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   ---
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   ## Key Workflows
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   ### Workflow 1: Handling Return to Daraz Warehouse (Complete Journey)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   **Step 1: Return Initiated**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   1. Customer initiates return request through buyer platform
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   2. Seller receives notification in "Return Initiated" tab
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   3. Review return reason and customer evidence
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   4. System schedules logistics pickup
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   **Step 2: Return in Progress**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   1. Logistics partner picks up product from customer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   2. Monitor return shipment tracking
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   3. Return moves to "Return in Progress" tab
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   4. Track product journey to warehouse
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   **Step 3: QC Inspection**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   1. Product arrives at Daraz warehouse
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   2. QC team inspects product condition
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   3. Status moves to "QC in Progress" tab
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   4. Wait for inspection results (typically 2-5 business days)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   **Step 4: QC Outcome**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   1. Receive QC inspection results
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   2. **If Returned (Approved):**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      - Refund issued to customer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         - Check responsibility (seller/customer fault)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            - Review impact on metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            3. **If Scrapped:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               - Product deemed unusable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  - Review scrapping reason
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     - Check financial implications
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        - Analyze quality issues
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        **Step 5: Resolution & Learning**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Analyze return reason and outcome
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Identify patterns in returns
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. Implement quality improvements
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        4. Update product listings if needed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        5. Improve packaging if returns due to damage
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ### Workflow 2: Managing Pending Seller Decision (Refund Only)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        **Step 1: Review Request**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Navigate to "Pending Seller Decision" tab
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Click on refund request to view details
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. Examine customer's reason and description
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        4. Review attached evidence (photos, videos)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        5. Check order history and customer account status
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        **Step 2: Gather Information**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Review original order details
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Check delivery confirmation and tracking
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. Review product listing and description
