                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ---
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ## Summary
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The Return Orders Management system provides comprehensive tools for handling both physical returns and refund-only requests. Success in return management requires:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. **Prompt Response:** Respond to all refund requests within 24 hours
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. **Thorough Documentation:** Maintain evidence for all shipments
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      3. **Fair Decision-Making:** Balance customer satisfaction with business protection
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      4. **Proactive Prevention:** Analyze patterns and prevent future returns
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      5. **Professional Communication:** Handle disputes calmly with facts
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      6. **Continuous Improvement:** Learn from return data to improve products and listings
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      By effectively managing returns, sellers can maintain healthy seller metrics, build customer trust, reduce return rates, and protect their business from fraudulent claims while providing excellent customer service.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ---
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      **Last Updated:** January 2026  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      **Feature Location:** Orders > Return Orders  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      **Feature URL:** https://sellercenter.daraz.com.bd/apps/order/reverse**If Refund Issued:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Monitor refund processing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Verify customer received payment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Analyze reason to prevent future issues
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Update listings if product issue identified
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Track refund rate metrics
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 **If Rejected & Upheld:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Case closed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Document decision reasoning
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - No financial impact
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Move on
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 **If Required to Refund After Rejection:**
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Accept platform decision
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Process refund as directed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Learn from case
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 - Adjust policies if needed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 ### Workflow 3: Handling QC Disputes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 **Scenario:** QC result is "Scrapped" but you believe item was damaged by cust
